title: Sated Devourer just wasn't a good idea
body:
It's like the perfect example of an item that's narrow enough that it's either going to be useless or completely broken depending on the champion using it.

A stacking jungle item is fine, giving it some lategame upgrade to make it worth hanging onto is a great idea. But doubling on-hits just shouldn't be that upgrade. It's power level is too closely tied to what abilities it can be abused with, and that's not really an effect that should exist. The closest item to it in that regard is Lich Bane, but even that's much more reasonable.
